text:
You use your lawyer, then it seems you are asking me not to respond through my lawyer? Thats strange.
You are continuing to make the decision to have lawyers manage this issue. If it’s solved then that’s all you needed to tell them but you have not.
Again you sent this through your lawyer over the holiday break, then they left town.
What was expectation on your side for reviewing and managing a response? I did not see in your letter, I’m sending this over the holiday weekend,
but because I will be away when you respond, please have Christine respond directly with Robert.
How was Lisa supposed to cancel Rosen if she’s gone?
It appears your strategy was never to cancel Rosen as that would have been impossible given Lisa is out and could not review any response after the
holidays.
I guess I have my answer.
We will be discussing Cabo solely on Friday. All other matters are resolved. It should be quick but cost thousands.
Message 3525 of 4024
You have spent 10x the amount of time it would have taken to discuss this, to instead put me down, insult me, and place blame. Young made that
choice and it is documented here.
I’m not your supply Christine. Find some other poor idiot to abuse. I’m focused on problem solving.
Sent:07/10/2024 at 08:54 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 07/10/2024 at 09:33 AM)
Subject:Re: summer schedule
Message 3526 of 4024
I think history shows this was Natalie’s choice. Keep choosing your own reality. It’s been amazing!!
Sent:07/10/2024 at 08:55 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 07/10/2024 at 09:33 AM)
Subject:Re: summer schedule
Message 3527 of 4024
We discussed last night. We agreed the ball is in our court and said we would make the meeting happen. I will send her an email with you cc’d as we
discussed so we can help Max and AD for a change.
You are sooo bitter. Sooo hateful. It’s almost like you and Lilian didn’t really think this through. It all seemed so simple and easy to take everything
from me for yourself and blow up the Moyers. Easy stuff!
You could have just started with therapy and a cooperative divorce. But you could not. Your condition does not allow for that. You have to place
blame in a binary world. There is no grey for you.
Sent:07/10/2024 at 09:04 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 07/10/2024 at 09:32 AM)
Subject:Re: Thoughts on Max (for tomorrow)
